title: Being Kinder to Yourself
description: When you’re helping others cope with stress and anxiety, how do you deal with your own? Psychiatrist Elizabeth Guinto tries a practice to be kinder to herself.
itunes:title: Being Kinder to Yourself
itunes:subtitle: The Science of Happiness
itunes:author: PRX and Greater Good Science Center
itunes:summary: When you’re helping others cope with stress and anxiety, how do you deal with your own? Psychiatrist Elizabeth Guinto tries a practice to be kinder to herself.
